dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is one of the most widely used 3D object detection datasets for autonomous driving, containing 7481 training samples and 7518 testing samples, with annotations for objects in the camera Field of Vision (FOV).
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:description: The Waymo Open Dataset is currently the largest public dataset for autonomous driving, including approximately 158K point cloud training samples and 40K point cloud validation samples, providing object annotations in the full 360° fields.
dcterms:title: Waymo Open Dataset
